newsitem.title: UK: Key stock and currency market movements at 1600 GMT.
newsitem.headline: Key stock and currency market movements at 1600 GMT.

text.p: The following table shows the latest close of key indices* on major world stock exchanges, the day's change in points and the indices' 1997 closing highs and lows (with dates). Also shown are the London closing values of the German mark, the Japanese yen, the British pound and gold billion (previous day's closes in brackets):
- - - - FOREIGN EXCHANGE/GOLD BULLION CLOSE IN LONDON Dollar/mark....1.8790 (1.8649)

Pound/dollar...$1.6248 ($1.6313) Gold (ounce)...$319.85 (323.85) - - - - *INDICES USED AND THEIR ALL-TIME CLOSING HIGHS New York Dow Jones industrial average -- 8,254.89 (Jul 30/97) London FTSE 100 index -- 4,964.2 (Jul 16/97) Tokyo Nikkei average -- 38,915.87 (Dec 29/89) Frankfurt DAX-3O index -- 4,438.93 (Jul 31/97) Paris CAC-40 General index -- 3,075.67 (Jul 31/97) Sydney Australian All-Ordinaries index -- 2,745.90 (Jul 2/97) Hong Kong Hang Seng index -- 16,379.22 (Aug 1/97)
